changeSet.author: vitalii.kim
changeSet.sql:
create table if not exists fact_sales ( id bigserial primary key,
account_id bigint not null,
source_platform text not null, source_event_id text not null,
order_id text,
source_product_id text, offer_id text,
warehouse_id bigint, category_id bigint,
quantity integer not null, sale_date date not null,
created_at timestamptz not null default now(), updated_at timestamptz not null default now(),
constraint uq_fact_sales_source unique (account_id, source_platform, source_event_id) );
changeSet.rollback: drop table if exists fact_sales cascade;
